title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.7 - Class b fresh surface waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.7 - Class b fresh surface waters

State Regulations

The best usages of Class B waters are primary and
secondary contact recreation and fishing. These waters shall be suitable for
fish, shellfish and wildlife propagation and survival. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
701.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
